summary:
I studied computer science at vocational high school and the University of Ondokuz Mayis. After education, I worked in various areas as a system administrator, analyst, and test developer. I am specialized in developing Front-End Technologies.

I have worked for Microsoft, Coca-Cola, Eczacibasi, Nuhr B.V., and Corendon. My roles in projects included migration processes, application design/development, and bug fixes.

I started Capgemini on 1st of November 2020

education.field_of_study: Computer Programming and Information Technology Associate Program

profile_positions.description:
Rabobank is one of the biggest banks in the Netherlands. 

In my role as software engineer, I am responsible for the provisioning system at the contact management department. All employees are linked through our systems so that they can work. You should think of systems such as CRM, HRM, Cisco. At this point, a large part of our work is logging information and conversations. 

I joined Feb 2021 at Rabobank, and I was responsible with legacy provisioning platforms, bug fixing and adding new necessary features. In 2022 all entire systems are moving to Azure Cloud and Genesys Cloud platforms. My 2 colleagues created these platforms and I joined them. I am responsible for improving the provisioning system on the cloud and also implementing 24 Sessions to this system. Most functions are written in JavaScript and TypeScript. In addition, mostly we are using PostgreSQL for DB.
profile_positions.title: Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Intero is an inspection and industrial services company. The company provides a complete range of services to the oil, gas, and petrochemical industries around the world. The R&D department develops monitoring and reporting applications for internal staff and clients, which requires high-quality user-friendliness. 

The software team was responsible for improving legacy applications and developing new applications with high-quality code in line with the needs. The software team mainly used the LabVIEW stack, and I used CEF (Chromium Embedded Framework) in development, Node.js, Electron.js, and React.js.

The software team where I work as a frontend developer was using waterfall methodologies. As a front-end developer, My main task was legacy application bug fixing, improving usability, and apply modern front-end technologies to applications.
profile_positions.title: Front End Engineer

profile_positions.description:
I was a freelance full-stack developer in a small team. The general goal was to deliver a useful, modern design that meets the customer's expectations.

In this period, I was responsible for the completely functional, user-friendly and modern website development.

While I work as a frontend developer, I used Kanban methodologies, at the same time I worked as a full-stack developer.  I used Firebase, Node.js, Vue.js, Express.js, Heroku for website development. I also used Jest and Jasmine for code testing.
profile_positions.title: Front End Developer

profile_positions.description:
Nuhr is an Amsterdam based travel company. The company has a small technology team. It has an online ticket sale website and management system. The expectation was to improve these products.
 
This small team responsible for the website design and front-end development worked together with a consultancy company. The software team used the Kanban methodology for projects. The software team mainly used backend (C#, Asp.Net, ASP.Net MVC), front-end (Asp.Net web forms, MVC Razor, handlebars.js, jQuery, and vanilla JavaScript, LESS/SCSS), Redis.

As a front-end developer, My main task on the front-end part improves the website with modern design technologies.
profile_positions.title: Front-End Developer

profile_positions.description:
Tursys is a technology company that develops B2B and B2C products for travel agencies, and the company provides clients contract-based consulting. The company's main target audience is travel agencies.
The company has a small technology team, this team consists of around 15 developers. I worked as a front-end developer in this team.

The software team used Kanban Methodology. As a front-end developer, My main task on the front-end part was to improve the web site with modern design technologies. The software team was mainly using backend (C#, Asp.Net, ASP.Net MVC), front-end (Asp.Net webforms, MVC Razor, handlebars.js, jQuery, and vanilla JavaScript, less/scss), Redis.
profile_positions.title: Front-End Developer

profile_positions.description:
Ceviz is a consultant company with an area of expertise in Microsoft tech stack as SharePoint, Power BI, Office 365. The company consultants help SharePoint migration, create new SharePoint portals, or solve SharePoint problems and power BI projects.
The company has around 20 developers in the software team. My role was in this SharePoint team (front-end) migration, SharePoint portal (front-end) development. I was using mainly SharePoint development tools, jQuery, and Vanilla JavaScript.

The company used waterfall methodology, I mainly worked with the design leader and backend developers. As a front-end developer, I was responsible for all front-end processes.
profile_positions.title: Front-End Developer
